entry.string: ChangeLog is a Xaraya Utility Module.
entry.translation: ChungeLug is a Xereya Uteelity Mudoole-a.

entry.string: that allows you to keep track of changes in module items.
entry.translation: thet elloos yuoo tu keep treck ooff chunges in mudoole-a items.

entry.string: For each hooked module, specify the fields you want to keep track of - someday, perhaps... :-)
entry.translation: Fur iech huuked mudoole-a, speceeffy zee feeelds yuoo vunt tu keep treck ooff - sumedey, perheps. Um gesh dee bork, bork!.. :-)

entry.string: There are no included blocks at this time
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks et thees teeme

entry.string: create/modify/update/delete -- Allows you to create/update change logs
entry.translation: creete-a/mudeeffy/updete-a/delete-a -- Elloos yuoo tu creete-a/updete-a chunge-a lugs

entry.string: display -- Allows you to display change logs
entry.translation: deespley -- Elloos yuoo tu deespley chunge-a lugs
